data.title: Tim O'Brien on LinkedIn: Savvy Games Group to buy mobile game publisher Scopely for $4.9B
data.meta_description:
It’s a big day for Scopely. What an amazing nine year ride, and it's just getting started. 

When I joined Scopely in 2014, the adventure ahead was unknown… | 52 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
Very proud of the many teams here that make the magic! And we didn't just "stumble" into this, a lot of very talented people decided to "go" after it and build exceptional experiences for our players. 😉 WINNER - Best Publisher - Scopely WINNER - Game of the Year - Monopoly GO WINNER - Best Live Ops - Stumble Guys HONORABLE MENTION - Best Audio/Visual Accomplishment - Monopoly GO NOMINATED - People's Choice - Monopoly GO

Today marks the first anniversary of Savvy Games Group’s acquisition of Scopely. To mark the occasion, we shared a cake with our friends at Scopely’s HQ. It has been a pleasure to work with Walter Driver, Javier Ferreira, Tim O'Brien and the team over the last year, they are inspiring leaders who have taken Scopely to new heights. Here’s to many more years of success and groundbreaking achievements. #Anniversary #games #Innovation #SavvyGamesGroup #Scopely #Teamwork

We are excited to share that Bob Loya has joined Scopely as SVP, Head of Studios Business Development and Developer Relations 🎉 Thank you Kayleigh Partleton at Pocket Tactics for spotlighting our new Scopelean! 👉 "Industry veteran joins Scopely" 👉 https://lnkd.in/gkZzX6tm With over two decades in the games industry, Bobby will continue to build transformative game teams and partnerships to further bolster our portfolio 🎮 📲 💻 🗣️ Our Chief Revenue Officer and Board Member Tim O'Brien shared, "We aim to bring in industry veterans to further support our ambitious game-making goals at Scopely, and Bobby is a fantastic example of our commitment to this aspiration. His exceptional track record over two decades in game studio development, coupled with his proven ability to drive innovation and foster strategic partnerships, perfectly aligns with Scopely’s vision for the future. We are confident that Bobby’s expertise will accelerate our journey toward even more milestones in the ever-evolving world of games.” Welcome to Scopely, Bobby! Read more on our Blog👇👇👇 "Scopely expands world-class business and game studio development leadership with the appointment of Bobby Loya" https://lnkd.in/gWQKKjFV #SeizeThePlay #OneScopely #NewHire #BusinessDevelopment

👏 Congrats to our Scopeleans for achieving the biggest casual mobile game launch EVER with "MONOPOLY GO!" and rolling past $1️⃣B in revenue! 🤯 Our CRO Tim O'Brien shared, “This accomplishment is beyond our wildest imagination, and we’re thrilled that fans love the 'MONOPOLY GO!' experience. It’s also been fantastic to once again partner with Hasbro → our players were immediately drawn in by everything they love about playing MONOPOLY that translated so well to mobile." Hasbro CEO Chris Cocks added, "Scopely created a super fun and engaging game that is breaking records in a highly competitive market." Celebrate “National Play Monopoly Day” with us this Sunday, November 19 with some fun giveaways! 🎲🎲🎲 Thank you Dean Takahashi at VentureBeat’s GamesBeat for sharing the news! https://bit.ly/3uj88Ue

We’re so happy to be at gamescom! Swing by the Xbox booth to say “Hi” to our Scopeleans 👋 and play “Stumble Guys!” 🎮 There might even been some cool “Stumble Guys” merch for you 😎🍌 See you on the showfloor! #SeizeThePlay #StumbleGuys #Xbox #GamesCom #Gaming Savvy Games Group Microsoft Microsoft Xbox Series X
